page.title: 02A Stranger in Norfolk CONT
page.content:
The first thing for example is you have to get used to different food because{you cannot get everything you {had in your own country.}Even all the daily habits may seem strange at first: How people greet each other, How they talk to each other, when they have their main meal of the day, the time they go to work, etc. There is also a different way of thinking and feeling{although in the end it may {come to the same result.
As there are so many things that are different from their equivalent in Germany for example, in the everyday life,{the most difficult task is to {accept them as they are and not to {compare which way is better.
